sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
relieves an unpleasant feeling
, deluje tako, da je neprijetni občutek manj neprijeten.

seg.quote: The passengers in the plane swallow to relieve the pressure on their eardrums.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
relieves someone of an unpleasant feeling or a difficulty
, odstrani neprijeten občutek ali težavo, ki je mučila tistega človeka.

seg.quote: The news relieved him of some of his embarrassment.
